title: roasted pork belly with boulangère potatoes
description: Boulangère potatoes are a lighter version of dauphinoise and a perfect foil for rich pork belly. Serve with homemade apple sauce and steamed vegetables.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 2oz pork belly, fat scored with a sharp knife
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 Bramley apples, peeled, cored removed, diced
